procedure.name: Delivery
procedure.statement: SELECT NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC {LIMIT 1}
SELECT SUM(CAST(OL_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(12,2))) AS OL_TOTAL FROM ORDER_LINE WHERE OL_O_ID = ? AND OL_D_ID = ? AND OL_W_ID = ?

procedure.name: OrderStatus
procedure.statement: SELECT O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? ORDER BY O_ID DESC {LIMIT 1}

procedure.name: StockLevel
procedure.statement: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (S_I_ID)) AS STOCK_COUNT FROM ORDER_LINE --splice-properties useSpark=false , STOCK --splice-properties useSpark=false WHERE OL_W_ID = ? AND OL_D_ID = ? AND OL_O_ID < ? AND OL_O_ID >= ? AND S_W_ID = ? AND S_I_ID = OL_I_ID AND S_QUANTITY < ?
